title: Did Agent Peter Starzock Twit get kicked out of the FBI that President Trump is a dictator, a Russian owner, and an unpleasant Madman?
subtitle: A sarcastic report called Struzuk released a combat tweet following the FBI agent's release of critical letters to President Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Former Federal Agent Peter Starzock has issued a tweet calling President Trump "accused," "Russian agent," and "crazy man."
